content: The story is about a man named Filon, who has superpowers and is a tram driver in the city of Liyue. He is a Portuguese expat in the city, but he has a strong sense of justice and wants to use his powers for the betterment of the city. In the first chapter, he meets Xiangling, a chef from Mondstadt, and they become friends. In chapter two, Filon uses his powers to save a group of people from a collapsing building, earning the gratitude of the city. In chapter three, Filon meets Barbara, a traveler from Mondstadt who helps him understand his powers better. In chapter four, Filon meets Beidou, a captain of the Crux Fleet, who he helps with a difficult situation. In chapter five, Filon meets Chongyun, a Cryo user who helps him control his powers. In chapter six, Filon meets Diluc, a powerful Pyro user who becomes his rival. In chapter seven, Filon meets Ganyu, Ningguang and Zhongli, who are adepti from Liyue and he cook for them, showing his skills as a cook and displaying his superpowers. In chapter eight, Filon meets Yanfei, a legal advisor from Liyue, who is shocked by the power of Filon and wants to tell Zhongli and Ningguang about it. Filon's powers are too much for her to handle, and he is forced to fight against her, Xiao and Shenhe. Filon wins the battle, but only after killing Xiao and injuring Shenhe. In chapter nine, Filon meets some playable characters from Inazuma and gets into some conflicts with them.
